response.overview: The Driver specializes in driving getaway cars for robberies. His exceptional talent has prevented him from being caught yet. After another successful flight from the police a self-assured detective makes it his primary goal to catch the Driver. He promises pardons to a gang if they help to convict him in a set-up robbery. The Driver seeks help from The Player to mislead the detective.
response.tagline: To break the driver, the cop was willing to break the law.
response.title: The Driver

titles.title: O asylliptos odigos tou San Francisco

release_dates.note: Los Angeles, California & New York City, New York

results.name: STUDIOCANAL PRESENTS: THE PODCAST - Episode 7 - A Celebration of Walter Hill's THE DRIVER
